import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ThemeContext } from '../context/ThemeContext'; import { useAddTargetModal } from '../context/AddTargetModalContext'; const Sidebar = ({ isCollapsed, toggleSidebar, isMobileNavOpen, toggleMobileNav }) => { const [modesOpen, setModesOpen] = useState(false); const [payloadsOpen, setPayloadsOpen] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); const { darkMode, toggleDarkMode } = useContext(ThemeContext); const { openModal } = useAddTargetModal(); const isActive = (path) => location.pathname === path; const sidebarClasses = ` fixed inset-y-0 left-0 z-20 flex flex-col w-60 bg-surface-light shadow-lg transform transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out ${isMobileNavOpen ? 'translate-x-0' : '-translate-x-full'} md:relative md:translate-x-0 ${isCollapsed ? 'md:w-16' : 'md:w-60'} `; const handleLinkClick = () => { if (isMobileNavOpen) { toggleMobileNav(); } }; return (

); }; export default Sidebar;
